languages.text: "Разбей эту мерзость. Лишать себя души — не выход".

traits.locale_text: "Разбей эту мерзость. Лишать себя души — не выход".

languages.text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."
languages.original_text: "Разбей эту мерзость. Лишать себя души — не выход".

traits.locale_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."
"Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."
"Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."
"Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."
"Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

languages.text: “摧毁那件邪恶的装置。无论怎样，你都不该剥夺自己的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

traits.locale_text: “摧毁那件邪恶的装置。无论怎样，你都不该剥夺自己的灵魂。”

languages.text: «Destruya ese dispositivo abominable. Sacrificar su alma nunca puede merecer la pena».
languages.original_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

traits.locale_text: «Destruya ese dispositivo abominable. Sacrificar su alma nunca puede merecer la pena».

languages.text: "Zerstört dieses abscheuliche Gerät. Sich der eigenen Seele zu berauben, kann nie die Lösung sein."
languages.original_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

traits.locale_text: "Zerstört dieses abscheuliche Gerät. Sich der eigenen Seele zu berauben, kann nie die Lösung sein."

languages.text: 「その忌まわしい装置を壊すんだ。自分自身から魂を奪うなど許されることではない」
languages.original_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

traits.locale_text: 「その忌まわしい装置を壊すんだ。自分自身から魂を奪うなど許されることではない」

languages.text: « Brisez cet appareil abominable. Se priver de son âme n'est jamais la solution. »
languages.original_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

traits.locale_text: « Brisez cet appareil abominable. Se priver de son âme n'est jamais la solution. »

languages.text: "O alçak cihazı kır. Kendini ruhundan mahrum bırakmak, doğru seçim olamaz."
languages.original_text: "Break that abominable device. Robbing yourself of your soul is never the way."

traits.locale_text: "O alçak cihazı kır. Kendini ruhundan mahrum bırakmak doğru seçim olamaz."
